notes: Successfully re-exported and extended Markov's inequality from mathlib. All 7 lemmas proven: basic form Pr[X≥a]≤E[X]/a, multiplicative form Pr[X≥t·E[X]]≤1/t, absolute value variant, and special cases. Leverages mathlib's meas_ge_le_lintegral_div. Clean difficulty 1 unit.
next_steps: Foundation for concentration inequalities and tail bounds
